name: iot-web-dashboard
description: IoT Web Dashboard for ESP32-C3/S3 with DHT22 sensor and LED control - Realtime monitoring and control via MQTT

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=app && npm run build --workspace=server
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --workspace=app && npm install --workspace=server
scripts.install:deps: npm ci --include=dev && npm ci --workspace=app && npm ci --workspace=server
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=app && npm run clean --workspace=server
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean:build --workspace=app && npm run clean:build --workspace=server
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=app && npm run lint --workspace=server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=app && npm run lint:fix --workspace=server
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=app && npm run test --workspace=server
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=app && npm run type-check --workspace=server
scripts.deploy:build: npm run clean:build && npm run install:deps && npm run build

author: IoT Dashboard Team
